# These Are the Absolute Best Wireless Earbuds, According to 400+ Hours of
Testing

We tested more than 20 top-tier options to find the best of the best.

![](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)

By [Stefan Vazharov](/author/14282/stefan-vazharov/)

Updated:  Jun 26, 2020

Shopping for wireless earbuds today can be an overwhelming experience because
of the sheer amount of options you can choose from. Whether you're looking for
[an affordable option](https://www.bestproducts.com/tech/gadgets/g958/cheap-
earbuds-earphones/), a [great workout
companion](https://www.bestproducts.com/tech/gadgets/a15385022/reviews-sports-
headphones-for-running-workouts/), or a pair of earphones that'll help you
[tune out your
surroundings](https://www.bestproducts.com/tech/gadgets/g170/best-noise-
canceling-headphones/), there are too many options to count.  

Well, we did the work for you, spending countless hours researching and
testing all that is out there.

You'll notice that most of our top picks today are completely wireless! Once
part of an expensive and questionable sub-category of products, today’s best
wire-free buds have evolved to deliver great sound, a reliable device
connection, and enough battery life to meet the demands of most users. Most
importantly, they're also priced competitively, making them more attainable
than ever before.

### Best Wireless Earbuds

  *  **Best Overall:** [Jabra Elite 75t Wireless Earbuds](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07X9VG6ZJ)
  *  **Runner Up:**[Soundcore Liberty 2 Pro Wireless Earbuds](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00E8BDS60) ****
  *  **Most Feature-Packed Under $100:** [Skullcandy Indy Fuel Wireless Earbuds](https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=74968X1547195&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.skullcandy.com%2Fshop%2Fearbuds%2Fbluetooth-earbuds%2Findy-fuel&sref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bestproducts.com%2Ftech%2Fgadgets%2Fa28480389%2Fwireless-earbud-earphone-reviews%2F%3Fpre%3Dtech%252Fgadgets%252F%26prefix%3Da%26id%3D28480389%26del%3D%26variantId%3D%26post%3D%252Fwireless-earbud-earphone-reviews)
  *  **Best Budget:** [Soundcore Life P2 Wireless Earbuds by Anker](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07SJR6HL3)
  *  **Best Beats:** [Powerbeats Pro Wireless Earbuds](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B088KVW6WZ)
  *  **Ultimate Neckband:** [RHA T20 Wireless In-Ear Monitors](https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=74968X1547195&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bhphotovideo.com%2Fc%2Fproduct%2F1505886-REG%2Frha_technologies_602055_t20_wireless_in_ear_headphones.html&sref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bestproducts.com%2Ftech%2Fgadgets%2Fa28480389%2Fwireless-earbud-earphone-reviews%2F%3Fpre%3Dtech%252Fgadgets%252F%26prefix%3Da%26id%3D28480389%26del%3D%26variantId%3D%26post%3D%252Fwireless-earbud-earphone-reviews)
  *  **Best Noise-Canceling:** [Sony WF-1000XM3 Truly Wireless Earbuds](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07T81554H/?linkCode=ogi)
  *  **Stylish and Handcrafted:** [Master & Dynamic MW07 Plus Wireless Earbuds](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07Y28C94T)
  * **Best for Bass:** [Sony WF-XB700 Extra BASS](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B085VQFZ8Z)
  * **Tailor-Made for Apple:** [Apple AirPods Pro](https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=74968X1547195&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.apple.com%2Fshop%2Fproduct%2FMWP22AM%2FA%2Fairpods-pro&sref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bestproducts.com%2Ftech%2Fgadgets%2Fa28480389%2Fwireless-earbud-earphone-reviews%2F%3Fpre%3Dtech%252Fgadgets%252F%26prefix%3Da%26id%3D28480389%26del%3D%26variantId%3D%26post%3D%252Fwireless-earbud-earphone-reviews)
  *  **Tailor-Made for Samsung:**[Samsung Galaxy Buds+ Wireless Earbuds](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B083KZDHTS) ****
  * **Good for You and the Planet:**[House of Marley Redemption ANC](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B083V54RGT)

### How We Tested

To find the best wireless earbuds, I spent more than 300 hours researching
roughly 20 potential entries from today's top brands. After poring over
reviews from consumers and reading the thoughts of other industry experts, I
set out on extensive personal testing.

I spent at least a week with every pick on this list, using the earbuds daily
on my commute, at work, and even while exercising. I evaluated the earbuds on
the following criteria:

  * Ergonomics and how they feel in the ear
  * Audio performance and overall sound quality
  * Fit during various activities
  * Battery life 

We all know that sound is one of the most important factors when shopping for
wireless earbuds. To test the earbuds' sound capabilities, I listened to [my
favorite
playlists](https://open.spotify.com/user/spotify/playlist/37i9dQZF1DWZtZ8vUCzche?si=lwHJV8t1TUWzeNaRGtXl9g)
— along with a few podcasts — and paid close attention to their audible
frequency range. The term relates to the headset's ability to deliver the
treble (highs), the midrange, and the bass in your favorite tracks.

The treble and the midrange performance sets the best wireless earbuds apart
from their rivals. It will help you enjoy the vocals, as well as the finer
details in a song's instrumental accompaniment to the fullest. Bass is
typically the easiest audio bit to reproduce. But, especially in affordably
priced headsets, it might come at the expense of the mids and the highs.

I also made and took calls using each headset in order to evaluate the quality
of its audio, as well as the performance of its built-in microphone(s).

Our Testing Process

[ ![](https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/how-we-
tested-1586186764.gif?crop=1xw:0.8887876025524157xh;center,top&resize=300:*)
How We Test Products ](/lifestyle/a29196296/how-we-test-products/)

Now that you know what to look for in a pair of wireless earbuds, check out
our reviews of the best options on the market today, and get ready to begin a
new sound journey without wires.

## Best Overall

[ ](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07X9VG6ZJ?linkCode=ogi)

Jabra Elite 75t Wireless Earbuds

Jabra amazon.com

$179.99

[SHOP NOW](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07X9VG6ZJ?linkCode=ogi)

The all-new Jabra Elite 75t earbuds are better in every way than their
[already excellent
predecessors](https://www.bestproducts.com/tech/gadgets/a28323955/jabra-
elite-65t-truly-wireless-earbuds-review/) — which just happened to be our
longtime top pick in the ballooning wireless earbud field. They're more
elegant, comfier, and more entertaining sound-wise. They last longer between
battery charges, too.

The Elite 75t deliver a powerful bass, which you can adjust via Jabra’s mobile
app. Thanks to four built-in microphones, phone calls sound amazing, too.
Finally, the buds last up to 7.5 hours between charges; their battery case
holds a few additional charges, for a total of 28 hours of wireless freedom.

All in all, these buds have everything you'd want in wireless earbuds.

Related Story

[ ![](https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/jabra-
elite-75t-earbuds-1576184177.jpg?crop=1.00xw:1.00xh;0,0&resize=300:*)
Reviewed: Jabra Elite 75t Wireless Earbuds ](/tech/gadgets/a30199338/jabra-
elite-75t-wireless-earbuds-review/)

## Runner-Up

[ ](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00E8BDS60?linkCode=ogi)

Soundcore Liberty 2 Pro Wireless Earbuds

Soundcore amazon.com

$149.99

[SHOP NOW](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00E8BDS60?linkCode=ogi)

The Soundcore Liberty 2 Pro truly wireless earbuds are Anker’s most exciting
audio product to date and a worthy alternative to our top pick from Jabra (we
do, however, think the Jabras are more comfortable and durable).

The buds have an impressive sound, which can be tailor-made to your hearing
via a feature called HearID. It's easy to set up in the mobile app and it sets
the buds apart from all competitors in their price range.

You'll get up to 8 hours of battery life from the buds, and the charging case
holds three additional full charges. The accessory is also compatible with
wireless charging.

Related Story

[ ![](https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/soundcore-
liberty-2-pro-wireless-
earbuds-1582061162.png?crop=1.00xw:1.00xh;0,0&resize=300:*) Reviewed:
Soundcore Liberty 2 Pro Wireless Earbuds ](/tech/gadgets/a30980385/soundcore-
liberty-2-pro-wireless-earbud-review/)

## Most Feature-Packed Under $100

[
](https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=74968X1547195&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.skullcandy.com%2Fshop%2Fearbuds%2Fbluetooth-
earbuds%2Findy-
fuel&sref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bestproducts.com%2Ftech%2Fgadgets%2Fa28480389%2Fwireless-
earbud-earphone-
reviews%2F%3Fpre%3Dtech%252Fgadgets%252F%26prefix%3Da%26id%3D28480389%26del%3D%26variantId%3D%26post%3D%252Fwireless-
earbud-earphone-reviews)

Skullcandy Indy Fuel Wireless Earbuds

skullcandy skullcandy.com

$99.99

[SHOP
NOW](https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=74968X1547195&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.skullcandy.com%2Fshop%2Fearbuds%2Fbluetooth-
earbuds%2Findy-
fuel&sref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bestproducts.com%2Ftech%2Fgadgets%2Fa28480389%2Fwireless-
earbud-earphone-
reviews%2F%3Fpre%3Dtech%252Fgadgets%252F%26prefix%3Da%26id%3D28480389%26del%3D%26variantId%3D%26post%3D%252Fwireless-
earbud-earphone-reviews)

The Skullcandy Indy Fuel truly wireless earbuds stand out in the crowded
sub-$100 field with a built-in Tile tracker in each bud, a battery case that’s
compatible with wireless charging, and a 2-year warranty. They also have a
durable design, a comfortable fit, and handy touch controls.

Equipped with 6-millimeter audio drivers, the earbuds deliver a bass-heavy
sound in music mode. Thankfully, there are two additional EQ presets (for
movies and podcasts) in case you find the lows too powerful.

Skullcandy offers the Indy Fuel in black or grey. In case you don’t care for
wireless charing, consider the [Indy Evo
earbuds](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0857K4HX4) instead. They offer the same
sound and features (sans wireless charging) for $20 less.

Related Story

[ ![](https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/skullcandy-
indy-fuel-wireless-earbuds-1591994504.jpg?crop=1.00xw:1.00xh;0,0&resize=300:*)
Reviewed: Skullcandy Indy Fuel Wireless Earbuds
](/tech/gadgets/a32850267/skullcandy-indy-fuel-wireless-earbuds-review/)

## Best Budget

[ ](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07SJR6HL3?linkCode=ogi)

Soundcore Life P2 Completely Wireless Earbuds by Anker

Soundcore amazon.com

$59.99

$44.99 (25% off)

[SHOP NOW](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07SJR6HL3?linkCode=ogi)

The Soundcore Life P2 completely wireless earbuds by Anker overdeliver for
their price tag. The buds have a refined design, a comfy fit, and an
entertaining sound with just the right amount of enhanced bass.

The matte-black finish with copper accents is particularly noteworthy, since
it gives them more of a luxury look. Their fully waterproof build with an IPX7
rating is also a great feature at this price point.

The buds’ battery endurance is also impressive. The same goes for their
carrying case with fast charging capabilities.  

Related Story

[ ![](https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/anker-
soundcore-life-wireless-earbuds-
review-1577723714.jpg?crop=1.00xw:1.00xh;0,0&resize=300:*) Reviewed: Soundcore
Life P2 Wireless Earbuds ](/tech/gadgets/a30297408/anker-soundcore-
life-p2-truly-wireless-earbuds-review/)

## Best Beats

[ ](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B088KVW6WZ?linkCode=ogi)

Powerbeats Pro Wireless Earphones

Beats amazon.com

$249.95

[SHOP NOW](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B088KVW6WZ?linkCode=ogi)

After weeks of testing, I can confidently say that the Powerbeats Pro may just
take the crown in the completely wireless earbuds realm. They offer iconic,
instantly recognizable design, impeccable comfort, excellent audio quality,
and up to 9 hours of battery between charges.  

With Apple's H1 chip on board, the Powerbeats Pro earbuds will effortlessly
connect to an iPhone, an iPad, or a Mac, as well as allow you to summon Siri
with voice commands. Their performance during calls is also excellent.

Related Story

[ ![](https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/beats-
earbuds-promo-1563549920.jpg?crop=1.00xw:1.00xh;0,0&resize=300:*) Reviewed:
Powerbeats Pro Wireless Earphones ](/tech/gadgets/a28438130/powerbeats-pro-
truly-wireless-earbuds-review/)

If you are [shopping for
Beats](//www.bestproducts.com/tech/gadgets/g1598/beats-headphones-earbuds/) on
a tighter budget, consider the
[Powerbeats](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0858JWG2S) instead. They have the same
audio performance and features, as well as longer battery life in a neckband
form factor with significantly lower price tag.

Related Story

[ ![](https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/powerbeats-
headphones-review-1584979364.jpg?crop=1.00xw:1.00xh;0,0&resize=300:*)
Reviewed: Powerbeats Wireless Earphones ](/tech/gadgets/a31875736/powerbeats-
wireless-earphones-review/)

## Ultimate Neckband

[
](https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=74968X1547195&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bhphotovideo.com%2Fc%2Fproduct%2F1505886-REG%2Frha_technologies_602055_t20_wireless_in_ear_headphones.html&sref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bestproducts.com%2Ftech%2Fgadgets%2Fa28480389%2Fwireless-
earbud-earphone-
reviews%2F%3Fpre%3Dtech%252Fgadgets%252F%26prefix%3Da%26id%3D28480389%26del%3D%26variantId%3D%26post%3D%252Fwireless-
earbud-earphone-reviews)

RHA T20 Wireless In-Ear Monitors

RHA bhphotovideo.com

$169.95

[SHOP
NOW](https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=74968X1547195&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bhphotovideo.com%2Fc%2Fproduct%2F1505886-REG%2Frha_technologies_602055_t20_wireless_in_ear_headphones.html&sref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bestproducts.com%2Ftech%2Fgadgets%2Fa28480389%2Fwireless-
earbud-earphone-
reviews%2F%3Fpre%3Dtech%252Fgadgets%252F%26prefix%3Da%26id%3D28480389%26del%3D%26variantId%3D%26post%3D%252Fwireless-
earbud-earphone-reviews)

If you're shopping for neckband earbuds, the RHA T20 Wireless should be your
gold standard, and if you're obsessed with high-quality wireless sound, you
need to give them serious consideration.

They have swappable tuning filters, which alter the sound on a hardware level.
You can choose to have powerful bass, enhanced vocals, or a balanced,
audiophile-grade sound.  

You can expect up to 12 hours of battery life from the T20 Wireless. I like
that RHA has equipped the product with a USB-C connector for charging. A wired
audio cable is also included, and RHA’s 3-year warranty is the best in the
business.

Related Story

[ ![](https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/rha-
earbuds-promo-1564411686.jpg?crop=1.00xw:1.00xh;0,0&resize=300:*) Reviewed:
RHA T20 Wireless Earbuds ](/tech/gadgets/a28530689/rha-t20-wireless-neckband-
earbuds-review/)

## Best Noise-Canceling

[ ](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07T81554H?linkCode=ogi)

Sony WF-1000XM3 Truly Wireless Earbuds

amazon.com

$229.99

$178.00 (23% off)

[SHOP NOW](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07T81554H?linkCode=ogi)

The Sony WF-1000XM3 earbuds have noise-canceling capabilities that are truly
in a league of their own.

They tune out ambient noise better than any competitor, including neckband
offerings that are nowhere near as compact and comfortable. I tip my cap to
Sony for achieving this feat in a completely wireless product.

You can adjust the noise-canceling level by tapping on the left bud, or fine-
tune it to your liking via Sony’s mobile app. There’s also the option to let
the WF-1000XM3 automatically adjust the noise-canceling experience based on
your surroundings.

Related Story

[ ![](https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/sony-
earbuds-review-promo-1564172809.jpg?crop=1.00xw:1.00xh;0,0&resize=300:*)
Reviewed: Sony WF-1000XM3 Wireless Earbuds ](/tech/gadgets/a28517828/sony-
noise-canceling-earbuds-review/)

However, you should be mindful that the WF-1000XM3 are not water-resistant.
Thankfully, Sony's more affordable [WF-SP800N
earbuds](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B087NHB75D) have a waterproof build and
noise-canceling tech. Their acoustic and noise-canceling capabilities are a
step behind the WF-1000XM3's, but impressive nonetheless, guaranteeing that
Sony remains the top pick.

Related Story

[ ![](https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/sony-wf-
sp800n-headphones-1589223530.jpg?crop=1.00xw:1.00xh;0,0&resize=300:*)
Reviewed: Sony WF-SP800N Wireless Earbuds ](/tech/gadgets/a32418723/sony-wf-
sp800n-wireless-earbuds-review/)

## Stylish and Handcrafted

[ ](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07Y28C94T?linkCode=ogi)

Master & Dynamic MW07 Plus Wireless Earbuds

MASTER & DYNAMIC amazon.com

$299.00

[SHOP NOW](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07Y28C94T?linkCode=ogi)

If you care about style and craftsmanship above all else, these will be your
newest obsession.

The Master & Dynamic MW07 Plus completely wireless earbuds are beautiful,
feature-packed, and totally worth their hefty price tag. Designed in New York
City, they have handcrafted acetate housings, which are available in a
multitude of eye-grabbing finishes. The buds are also comfy and water-
resistant.

Like all M&D products, the MW07 Plus buds sound exceptional, thanks to finely
tuned audio drivers. Unlike their
[predecessors](https://www.bestproducts.com/tech/gadgets/a25439636/master-and-
dynamic-mw07-wireless-earbuds-review/), they pack adjustable noise-canceling
tech. They have epic battery life and a stylish charging case.

Related Story

[ ![](https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/master-
dynamic-mw07-earbuds-1577737502.jpg?crop=1.00xw:1.00xh;0,0&resize=300:*)
Reviewed: Master & Dynamic MW07 Plus Earbuds ](/tech/gadgets/a30338164/master-
and-dynamic-mw07-review/)

## Best for Bass

[ ](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B085VQFZ8Z?linkCode=ogi)

Sony WF-XB700 Extra BASS Wireless Earbuds

Sony amazon.com

[SHOP NOW](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B085VQFZ8Z?linkCode=ogi)

Sony’s WF-XB700 Extra BASS wireless earbuds, as their name suggests, are a
dream-come-true for those who like to enjoy tunes with a powerful low range.
In addition to a wow-inducing sound, the buds have a pleasantly understated
design, intuitive controls, and, best of all, a price tag that’s impossible to
resist.

Thanks to a comfy fit with secure tri-hold setup and an IPX4 rating for water
resistance, the WF-XB70 earbuds are also perfect for exercising. You can order
them in black or blue.

The earbuds can last up to a rather amazing 9 hours between battery charges.
Equipped with a futureproof USB-C connector, their carrying case holds one
additional full charge.

Apple AirPods Pro

Apple bestbuy.com

$249.99

[SHOP
NOW](https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=74968X1547195&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bestbuy.com%2Fsite%2Fapple-

earbud-earphone-reviews)

As their name suggests, the AirPods Pro pack even more features than the
[iconic and ubiquitous regular variant](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07PYLT6DN),
headlined by superb noise-canceling tech, vastly improved ergonomics (there’s
a test to ensure that they fit perfectly!), as well as an IPX4 rating for
water resistance. The latter is truly groundbreaking, because it makes the
earbuds ideal for exercising.

The sound of the AirPods Pro is impressive as always. Regardless of your
content preferences, the buds will deliver a sonic experience that’s balanced
and entertaining in equal measure.

The AirPods Pro are, unsurprisingly, incredibly easy to pair with Apple
devices. They are hands-down the best option for iPhone, iPad, and Mac users.

## Tailor-Made for Samsung

[ ](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B083KZDHTS?linkCode=ogi)

Samsung Galaxy Buds+ Wireless Earbuds

Samsung amazon.com

$138.99

[SHOP NOW](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B083KZDHTS?linkCode=ogi)

The Galaxy Buds+ are Samsung’s equivalent to the Apple AirPods. The completely
wireless earbuds pair seamlessly with Galaxy smartphones, just like the
AirPods do with an iPhone. You can even charge them wirelessly (their case is
compatible) off the back of your Samsung phone, so long as it’s a Galaxy S10
or newer.

Outstanding battery life is why everyone should consider the Galaxy Buds+, not
just existing Samsung owners. With up to 11 hours of playback between charges,
the earbuds can rock out longer than any competitor.

As their name suggests, the Galaxy Buds+ have not only a longer battery life,
but also a better sound than [the previous
generation](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07V2622RG). The performance during
calls is also vastly improved.

## Good for You and the Planet  

[ ](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B083V54RGT?linkCode=ogi)

House of Marley Redemption ANC Wireless Earbuds

Marley amazon.com

$199.99

[SHOP NOW](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B083V54RGT?linkCode=ogi)

The House of Marley Redemption ANC are the most Earth-friendly wireless
earbuds available today.

Like all of the brand’s products, the noise-canceling earbuds and their
charging case are crafted using sustainably sourced materials, including
recycled plastic and silicone, plus reclaimed wood, among others. They make
the Redemption ANC not only eco-friendly accessories, but also characterful
ones with conversation-worthy design.

The sound of the Redemption ANC earbuds is headlined by a powerful and
entertaining bass, just as you’d expect from a House of Marley product. Their
noise-canceling performance is not on par with the product category’s best
offerings from Sony and Apple.
